name: @p2pago/zkp2p-donate
description: Client-side SDK for ZKP2P donations, support status, and HTTP 402 payment flows

scripts.build: npm run build:esm && npm run build:cjs && npm run build:umd
scripts.test:demo: npm run build && echo 'Open http://localhost:3000/test/demo.html?local=1' && npx serve .
scripts.build:umd: rollup -c rollup.config.js && node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const p='dist/umd/zkp2p-donate.js'; let s=fs.readFileSync(p,'utf8'); s=s.replace(/ethers\.AbiCoder\.defaultAbiCoder\(\);/g,'if (ethers && ethers.AbiCoder) { ethers.AbiCoder.defaultAbiCoder(); }'); fs.writeFileSync(p,s);"
